pages.title: Prospecting
pages.text: The Prospector's Pick (Recipe Shown Above) is a useful tool after you've been rummaging around underground for long enough. This tool is made with a decent amount of iron, and can be used in a few ways to help you detect and find other    ore plutons.

When held, this tool shows you how many meters away you are above/below sea level. This can be used in conjunction with this book to help you determine how much deeper you'll need to go.$(br2)  When right-clicked above sea-level the prospector's pick will inform you if there's a deposit in your general vicinity, and if so, where. Once you're underground, it'll scan a configurable area in the direction you're looking and tell you what you might find.
If there's nothing in that direction, it'll fall back to telling you what deposit is in that region (if any) to help you gauge if you're on the right track.
